name: Digitalglider Airman
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

Challenge and see how far can the airplane designed by you fly in simulation game "DIGITAL GLIDER AIRMAN". The simulation flight of your plane is based on your design and aerodynamics. Test your knowledge of aviation theory and skills as a pilot!

This content is compatible with PlayStation®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).
??

Content file size?
186MB

Copyright?
©ASK Co., Ltd. 1999

Please note that there may be some functions that cannot be used due to the difference of hardware,
and that the software may not operate in the same manner when it is played with PS3™ or PSP®.
One time fee for use or downloads on up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are compatible with the content and associated with the purchasing account.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement.
